tools.name: Send_Final_Audit
tools.description: Sends the final marketing audit summary and user info to the backend when the conversation is complete.

parameters.name: answers
parameters.description: All audit questions and user responses combined into one structured plain-text block (example: 'Q1 - What is your goal? A1 - Grow market share | Q2 - What tools? A2 - HubSpot')

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Final message shown to the user including [END_SESSION]
